title: As User, I want Two-Way Player to be included on the Email Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Utilities portion of the Email Utility
custom_expected:
THEN Two-Way Players Notifications will be added to the utility
AND users will be able to be added for each club and the BOC

title: As BOC User, I don't want Club Users to be able to edit the position of any player on the 40-Man Roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club

Data Discovery:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3774874/Info+Tab+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to a players profile
custom_expected:
THEN if a player is on the 40-man roster, with any status, the player's position will not be editable to any Club User
AND position on 40-man players will now ONLY be editable to BOC Users.

title: As a User, I want to see the number of pitchers on Roster Dashboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire: 
https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=roster_widget_changes
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the roster dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN the Roster Dashboard will display the number of pitchers on a team's roster
AND this will be a count of players with one of the following positions:
-- LHR, LHS, RHR, RHS
AND the layout will match the provided wire
AND there will be a tooltip that appears when hovering over the Active Roster Count and the Pitcher count
AND the tooltip will match the provided layout
AND Position players will count if they are one of the following positions:
-- C, IF, SS, UTL, 1B, 2B, 3B, CF, LF, OF, RF, DH, PH

title: As User, I want the Two-Way Player Utility to roll over at the end of the season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget
custom_steps: WHEN the day after the last day of the regular season is reached
custom_expected:
THEN the TWP Widget will roll over to the next year
AND a snapshot will be taken of the widget at this time and stored
AND Users will be able to access past year snapshots using the years header filter on the widget
AND the snapshot will reflect the EOS positions, and stats of each org

title: As User, I want Designating a player as a Two-Way player to create a line item on the Player's History
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a player is "Designated" as a Two-Way Player on the Utility
custom_expected:
THEN a new row will be created on the Player History of the player's profile
-- Date: [Date the player was designated]
-- Code: TWP
-- Description: Designated as Two-Way Player

title: As User, I want Designating a player as a Two-Way player to appear on the Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a player is "Designated" as a Two-Way Player on the Utility
custom_expected:
THEN a new row will be created on the Transaction Bulletin
-- Org: Player's Org
-- Player: Last, First
-- Pos: Player's Position
-- Current MLS: Player's Current MLS
-- Transaction Date: [Date the player was designated]
-- Approval Date: [Date and Time the player was designated]
-- Description: Designated as Two-Way Player

title: As User, I want to receive an email when a player is approaching the Two-Way Player threshold
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a player is considered to be approaching (15 IP or 15 GS)
custom_expected:
THEN the system will send an email to the player's club as members of the BOC and indicated on the email utility:
- Subject: Player Approaching Two-Way Player Threshold
- Content: [Player Roster First] [Player Last] is approaching the threshold for Two-Way Player designation. Please log into EBIS to review and contact BOC with any questions or concerns.

AND the email will contain a link to the Two-Way Player Utility

title: As User, I want to receive an email when a player crosses the Two-Way Player threshold
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a player has crossed the threshold for two-way player designation (20 IP or 20 GS)
custom_expected:
THEN the system will send an email to the player's club and members of the BOC as indicated on the email utility:
- Subject: Player Has Reached Two-Way Player Threshold
- Content: [Player Roster First] [Player Last] has satisfied the criteria for being designated a Two-Way Player.

In the event that you would like [Player Roster First] [Player Last] to officially be considered a Two-Way Player per the Major League Rules, you must contact BOC to make that change. Until BOC has approved the change, [Player Last] will continue to be considered a (BOC Position) for the purposes of pitcher and position player roster limits.

AND the email will contain a link to the Two-Way Player Utility

title: As User, I want to see a Two-Way Player Displayed as TWP on reports
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a player is designated as a Two-Way Player
custom_expected:
THEN their position will be displayed as TWP, on all reports
AND This will require identifying all reports that include postion
AND updating all views necessary to accommodate the change
AND verifying report did not break after inclusion of TWP
-- Assumption is sorting / grouping will break on some reports

title: As User, I want to be informed of the position my player is being added to the roster with when creating the transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN player selected must have .000 Major League Service in current year
custom_steps: WHEN user creates transaction that will add player to roster (i.e.: Selection to Mj/Sign to Mj League)
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction moving the player to the roster will display the following message to the club user:
- "Player will be added to the roster as [Stat Position]. If you would like this changed, please contact BOC."

AND if MJ Stat position is blank, then MN Stat position will display
